This has truly gone beyond belief. Apparently, in the backwards and wildly manipulative thinking of XXXX & XXXX, its perfectly fine how they filed false CFPB responses last year saying they had to sue me because I stopped paying my debt, when they keep attaching their own evidence that shows I WAS making partial, infrequent payments up to their lawsuit ( CFPB and Synchrony : Please see attached ). I even stated at the very beginning of my original XXXX complaint that I was making partial payments to keep the account alive for Synchronys benefit ( CFPB : Please see attached ). And XXXX & XXXX thinks the entirety of their response to case number XXXX is perfectly fine. ( Thats the one where they hardly answered a single thing I was actually saying, and then came back with a belligerent caveman-bashing-a-club response. Where they accused me of making things up with my imagination, which carelessly contradicted part of Synchronys explanation they had already filed about my account being locked on case number XXXX, while XXXX & XXXX claimed things I NEVER said! ) The only slander, if any, I see throughout this entire case are the routinely dishonest and instigative responses provided by XXXX XXXX and XXXX XXXX. All Im doing is expressing justified anger since this company insists on legally attacking, bullying, and lying about me without a care in the world. In regards to the payments I DIDNT stop making in early XXXX : If XXXX & XXXX ever wanted to slow down in XXXX and have an honest conversation about how I wasnt paying them enough, or I should be paying more often, thats a completely different scenario. But whatever statements they made ( or continue to make ) that claims or suggests that their adversarial legal attack had to happen RIGHT NOW because I completely stopped paying them are deceptive and untrue, and their whole lawsuit process amounts to a dishonest bully attack. How many times are we going to loop through this, and how many new infractions are you going to keep piling on what youve already done wrong, before you step back and realize to yourselves : You are LYING! There was no justification to SUE ME the way you did! And now XXXX & XXXX is making implied threats with the judgment they gained through unfair brute-force tactics, like the XXXX they randomly filed in XXXX this year. Thats at the core of this whole argument : Their XXXX actions will NEVER be Okay, since they were never honest to begin with! And none of these problems have been ever been addressed or resolved at a legal trial, since XXXX XXXX came in at the last second to make sure THERE WAS NO TRIAL in XX/XX/XXXX! Now to address some of the current conflicts from the most recent CFPB exchange ( XXXX ). XXXX XXXX states : " XXXX XXXX has reverted back to claiming that his account has been assigned. '' YES! Because XXXX trying go off what XXXX XXXX told me in previous CFPB responses. And to remind everyone AGAIN, it took 2-3 filed reports just to get anyone to answer the question Wait a second. Who owns my account right now? On case number XXXX, Synchrony themselves specifically stated Account no longer with Synchrony Bank XXXX but XXXX XXXX has been adamant Synchrony still owns the account and XXXX XXXX XXXX are just the representatives. Strictly speaking, Im still waiting for Synchronys response just to clear up THAT issue, too! All of the frustration and confusion on this specific part of the complaint is the fault of YOU ( XXXX & XXXX and Synchrony ) and only YOU! I have never heard of a situation where theres a client ( the bank ), an attorney representing client ( XXXX & XXXX ), the attorney files major legal cases on behalf of the client, but then the client and the attorney make a pointed effort to have NOOO coordination between each other whatsoever. You know guys, a little bit of friendliness and communication between your two organizations could have cleared up that other Why was my account getting locked out in XXXX? question months ago. I tried to file that question directly to Paypal on case number XXXX ( since the Account Locked emails came from Paypals system ), but they rejected it without actually saying anything, and CFPB forwarded it to Synchrony. Synchrony took 60 days to come back with a long-winded response about my written identity form being declined ( WHICH WASNT EVEN THE THING I WAS COMPLAINING ABOUT IN CASE NUMBERS XXXX AND XXXX ) and then their response barely addressed the e-mails I got from Paypal saying my account was locked due to unusual activity ( thats the thing I WAS trying to figure out in those two complaints! ) XXXX XXXX also states in his most recent CFPB communication regarding the more recent, NOT DUPLICATE complaints : Synchrony has responded. XXXX & XXXX has responded. Well, please just refer to the attached screenshot of my current CFPB dashboard, which disproves half of that statement. SYNCHRONY HAS NOT RESPONDED to about five different new complaints so far. In fact, they keep telling the CFPB they need more time before they CAN respond! Again, we see an example of XXXX XXXX being an unapologetic, wildly hypocritical XXXX through a Federal reporting system, where hes filing patented false responses in a cheap rush to crush me like a bug ( when HIS company is the one who is unjustly attacking ME! ), while avoiding any legal integrity or responsibility on his side. But what else is new?! Also in the process of his XXXX response, XXXX XXXX AGAIN completely refused to address my question : XXXX XXXX letter were you talking about in XXXX? But I DID have such requests in place for other creditors, and some of those other creditors were violating their request within a matter of weeks when XXXX & XXXX popped out with their ambush lawsuit last year. Im dealing with a big powerful bully forcing me into a corner, where I have to wonder if theres some kind of illicit connection between XXXX & XXXX strange timing last year and the other creditors, too! Im attaching another CFPB case from last year just to illustrate ONE example of this happening. ) XXXX & XXXX is going to keep treating me like total junk with no consumer rights whatsoever, and I dont even understand why, other than just because I have debt. Whatever advice XXXX XXXX is getting from the CFPB, this advice is clearly skewed by the fact hes not giving an honest account of his actions to the CFPB. AS IT SPECIFICALLY PERTAINS TO IDENTITY THEFT : Was I victimized by identity theft in XXXX and XXXX that was perfectly and eerily timed just before XXXX XXXX XXXX legal attacks? Product: Credit card

Consumer complaint narrative:
I don't know how this company or " sisterhood of companies '' got my address or opened credit card accounts in my name. I admit I don't always pay too much attention to bills and have been known to pay bills I don't owe just to get them out of my sight. But twice now, these " sister companies '' ( XXXX XXXX, and XXXXXXXX XXXX  ) have sent me bills for amounts greatly more than the amount of merchandise they say was ordered. 

I did not order anything at all from them and I did not receive anything. They don't answer me and continue to send bills that increase by {$49.00} each month, when the merchandise they are saying was ordered was less than that. The first time, it was referred to a bill collector, XXXX XXXX, and I talked to the agent, explained the situation and he agreed to deal with it. He did, and I received no more bills for about a year, I think it was. 

Then the same thing happened again, with " XXXXXXXX XXXX '' and I explained what happened when they called. This time, the agent not only refused to stop with the late fees until we could get it straightened out, but reinstated the other debt that had been written off! 

I don't like to be scammed, but it's tempting to just pay it to stop the harrassment. However, I don't think it's right, and if no one fights them they'll just keep on with this kind of thing. 

It is totally wrong to charge late fees that amount to more than the original merchandise, totally wrong to keep compounding them month after month, and totally wrong to harrass people who have not ordered or received merchandise for payment on these bogus accounts.

Mortgage
Sub-issue: Escrow, taxes, or insurance
Consumer complaint narrative:
On XX/XX/year>, I purchased my home in XXXX XXXXXXXX through XXXX XXXX XXXX At the time, my loan was processed, in XXXX XXXX, as a secondary residence because I was living in XXXX  at the time. In XXXX XXXX the taxes are tripled when a home is processed as an investment property. However, once you obtain residency, the loan is adjusted to reflect the taxes for a primary residence. 

So, the week of XXXX XXXX, after the closing, I obtained my XXXX XXXX  driver 's license, I updated my license plates and my car registration and insurance were switched to XXXX XXXX. It wasn't until XXXX XXXX XXXX  that the XXXXXXXX XXXX Assessor 's office approved my application for primary residency. Normally, the mortgage lender would take this information and quickly and promptly readjust the tax rates on the loan to reflect the change in residency. This is has not been the case almost two months later! 

I contacted XXXX at the end of XXXX to process this change for my mortage payment because it will reduce my payment by about {$470.00}, along with whatever the new escrow adjustment will be! This is a hefty overage that I have to pay! XXXX said my bank switched to Specialized Loan Servicing ( I did not sign off on any contracts or documents to SLS ). So, my bank lender, XXXX XXXX / XXXX XXXX, and I contacted SLS on XX/XX/XXXX at XXXX. They instructed us to send over the residency approval and tax adjusted rate, uploading the documents to XXXX. We did and the woman said it would take 10 days to process, so we said we'd call back in 10 business days.

I called SLS back on XX/XX/XXXX and they said my loan had just transferred from SLS to shellpoint/new rez, again ... without me signing any agreement or contract... and they can't access my information in the computer to check status of my documents until the loan transfers. This was a Friday and I said I'd call on Monday. I called back SLS on Monday and my loan had transferred, but the rep said there's nothing in the computer. I argued how that's possible in 2024 that documents are not carried over! This loan was in the process of being adjusted and now, all traces are wiped from the system?? And we have to start the process over?? I told the woman I want a supervisor or manager to call me, and no one did! 

My bank lender, XXXX, and I conferenced called SLS AGAIN on Tuesday, XX/XX/XXXX to get this resolved. The gentleman instructed us to send an email with the same documents we already uploaded on XXXX to which he said their company doesn't use/their computer doesn't recognize. He also said to call back in two business days to check status. Today is Sunday, the XXXX. My lender was unable on Thursday and Friday of last week for us to call back again. I want this mortgage adjusted before my XXXX payment AND I want a refund for the overage for my XXXX mortgage because this should have been processed!! My lender said she has never seen this process take THIS LONG or anyone have this much trouble getting it straightened out, ESPECIALLY in this state where it is a requirement!! 

We are planning to call tomorrow! However, I went on XXXX to check out New Rez/Shellpoint and came across comments of people going through the same situation with this company extorting money from lenders! One individual commented and said " New Rez is part of SLS, which is a 3rd party collection agency, which is illegal! They get away with criminal activity by merging with new rez shellpoint so they can extort money from you. If you never signed a purchase of agreement to pay a debt, it is illegal on their part! It is identity theft and ask then to show you where you signed this purchased and if they are licensed in your state. They are nothing but criminals, and third party with no legal right to receive extorted money. '' He goes on to say that SLS is a collection agency and they break the law all the time selling and buying mortgages as a third party without you signing a contract with them. 

How is this allowed??? My loan was processed through XXXX XXXX!! And you tell me, not only are you not adjusting my rate according to XXXX  law, you keep transferring my loan to all these companies that I am not contracted with??? Somebody better get my loan adjusted properly before my XXXX payment!
Company public response: Company believes it acted appropriately as authorized by contract or law

Product: Checking or savings account
Issue: Problem with a lender or other company charging your account
Sub-issue: Transaction was not authorized
Consumer complaint narrative:
XXXX  places duplicate holds for each trip I take using their drivers. The initial one is legitimately what I authorize them to make in order to pay for my trip but I do not authorize them to place another hold on my account, besides. The second is illegal because it is not authorized by me. The bank I use simply accespts those holds, but it is clearly wrong. The second is that XXXX is a technology-based service and one would expect their holds to last no more than a day after the completion of a trip. On average the holds last 4 days and nothing justifies this reckless conduct. Besides, the holds I authorize which are legitimate XXXX may place other holds days after the trip was concluded and they do not care to explain why. Every time, I have complained they have no customer service personnel answering questions so their website requests me to send the documentation accompanying the complaint. Sad story is that they never revert to me to fix the problem. I have come to understand from other users of both XXXX and XXXX that this is the way these two companies do business here in the United States. XXXX does not do that in that countries and it is not even standard practice in other countries where the rideshare services exist. 

There is also an unfair business activity XXXX and XXXX engage in. If a rider is not immediately available to ride when the driver arrives, after 5 minutes the driver can cancel the trip and charge the rider anything between {$3.00} and {$10.00}. Similarly XXXX levies extra charges after 2 minutes of a driver arriving at a pick up. Their drivers delay riders all the time, but there is never any compensation for our lost time. If it is good for them to charge riders for missing rides and or delaying the pick ups, it must be equally good for them to compensate riders when their drivers routinely cancel trips. 

The net effect of this conduct on poor people like me is that XXXX places more holds than they should on my money thus denying me access to my money for days on end. This conduct is wrong if not criminal. This needs to be thoroughly investigated, and they must be punished. My complaint is about conduct that is wrong and the majority of these rideshare companies have now gotten used to the illegal treatment. For the avoidance of doubt, there is not a single way to justify their system not completing their trips like they used to do with all the necessary charges calculated at the end of a trip. Anything else is illegal, wrong and an inconvenience to users like me. This must be stopped immediately.

Consumer complaint narrative:
I previously filed a complaint against US Bank earlier in XXXX- Consumer Financial Protection Bureau XXXX. Unfortunately, my mother got very ill and I was unable to respond within the 60-day window about the response containing false information and also mis-stating the compensation they previously offered. I would like to respond to their response. In their letter response dated XX/XX/XXXX, US Bank states that their " system notes indicate you requested to cancel your application on XX/XX/XXXX because you were not satisfied with rates. '' This is false information they provided in their response letter. I never verbally or in writing requested that my application by cancelled for re-financing the loan. I would like to request that US Bank produce any written communication or verbal recording of me directing them to cancel the application. 

They also never refunded me the {$300.00} appraisal fee they said they would refund me for what transpired and also the {$5000.00} check they offered as compensation. Now they are changing the terms to it being part of the re-finance which was never what was discussed with XXXX XXXX - Mortgage Area Manager in XXXX California. 

I would like their manager to call me at XXXX or e-mail me at XXXXXXXX XXXX XXXX  Below is the original complaint I provided : 1. US Bank bought my current mortgage from Union Bank earlier this year. 2. In early XXXX, I was contacted by XXXX XXXX, who was a Private Mortgage Banker for US Bank based in XXXX California. He offered me a no-cost mortgage refinance under US Bank 's private wealth group. I communicated that I wanted to move forward with the Interest Only ARM option at a 5.75 % Interest Rate. ( see attachment of e-mail ) XXXX. On XX/XX/XXXX, XXXX XXXX sent me an e-mail requesting certain information be sent to him to lock in the refinance interest rate / APY. I was offered two ARMs, one principal and interest and one interest only. XXXX. On XX/XX/XXXX, I sent XXXX XXXX all the information requested to lock in the refinance interest rate. XXXX. On XX/XX/XXXX, XXXX XXXX responded confirming he received all the information necessary to lock in the rate. XXXX. Around XX/XX/XXXX, my wife and I e-signed all the documents to process the loan through underwriting. We signed U.S. Bank paperwork affirming the 5.75 % interest rate. XXXX. On XX/XX/XXXX, I received an e-mail from US Bank stating our refinance mortgage was " conditionally approved based on an initial review... [ a ] member of your loan team will be reaching out to help assist you with documentation requirements. '' XXXX. Around XX/XX/XXXX, I also paid US Bank a {$390.00} fee for an appraisal of our home. An appraiser who did not act professionally came to my home and performed an appraisal. XXXX. On XX/XX/XXXX, I received an e-mail from XXXX XXXX XXXX, an associate of XXXX XXXX, stating that underwriting had issued conditional approval but needed additional items to complete my file. I provided all the documents requested on XX/XX/XXXX. XXXX XXXX XXXX sent me an e-mail stating she received everything. XXXX. On XX/XX/XXXX, I sent additional information requested by XXXX XXXX XXXX and I received a confirmation from XXXX XXXX XXXX that she received the information needed. XXXX XXXX XXXX 's e-mail stated " Received. Will review and let you know if anything else needed. '' XXXX. On XX/XX/XXXX, I received an e-mail from XXXX XXXX XXXX stating : " We are waiting for underwriting to review the items provided. I will let you know once we have an update. '' XXXX. After XX/XX/XXXX, I received no direct e-mails or phone calls from XXXX XXXX or XXXX XXXX XXXX. I also received no communication from US Bank about my mortgage refinance for several weeks. XXXX. In XX/XX/XXXX, I began sending e-mails and calling XXXX XXXX to get an update on the status of the mortgage refinance. I never received any responses nor a notification they were no longer with US Bank. XXXX. On XX/XX/XXXX, I e-mailed a US Bank employee named XXXX XXXX XXXX, who was very pleasant. She passed my along to her supervisor, XXXX XXXX, who informed me that XXXX XXXX and XXXX XXXX XXXX were no longer employed with US Bank. XXXX. In early XXXX, XXXX XXXX put me in touch with a sales manager in the US Bank Mortgage division who informed me the mortgage refinance at the 5.75 % interest rate could not be honored and my loan application was going to be cancelled. XXXX. On XX/XX/XXXX, and XX/XX/XXXX, I received e-mails from US Bank under the name of XXXX XXXX that state : " Thank you again for your home mortgage refinance application. We truly value you and appreciate your patience ... As we move toward your closing date, please know your loan team is available to assist with status updates and questions or to submit any updated documentation required. '' XXXX. In late XXXX, I sent an email with my complaint to executives at U.S. Bank. They responded by having a mortgage relationship manager reach out to me to find a resolution. After multiple weeks of waiting, they offered me a small monetary value to resolve the complaint, which I did not accept since the immediate value of the offered mortgage refinance rate was greater than the monetary value they offered.

Product: Money transfer, virtual currency, or money service
Consumer complaint narrative: I attempted to invest in XXXX with a plan to store it in cold storage. Starting on XXXX and going through the end of the year, I accumulated XXXX BTC. After a test transaction ( and one other XXXX XXXX XXXX  ), the ability to send crypto off of the Coinbase platform was revoked ( XX/XX/XXXX ). I contacted their support starting out weekly and then eventually monthly. I felt like the lead me on by saying on multiple occasions that my " account is being reviewed by a specialist team and my ability to send would be reinstated on X date ''. So, I continued to build up my position because I felt like Coinbase was reputable enough in the crypto space and I have not done anything shady whatsoever and would never do anything shady. Anyway, the investment value grew to over $ XXXX USD and I was starting to get nervous about 1 ) my assets being on a crypto exchange where I am considered to be an " unsecured creditor '' so long as the exchange is the custodian 2 ) the horrendous support. They have a tier 1 support that you can contact and they are usually quick to help and respond, but I was given exactly 0 insight into when my sending feature would be reenabled and why it was disabled in the first place. They even told me that for security reasons they couldn't talk about the details of my review. I opened up a formal Coinbase complaint on XX/XX/XXXX regarding my ability to send. On XXXX XX/XX/XXXX they finally got back to me ( after the deadline they have for responding to the complaint ) and they replied with " In that case, we explained that To safeguard against potential loss from an irreversible transaction, your account has been prohibited from sending cryptocurrency off the Coinbase platform until XXXX XX/XX/XXXX. In the meantime, you can still convert your crypto to cash and transfer the funds to your verified bank account. ". So, of course I ask for more details and get nothing. I own the Bitcoin and I want to store it in a multi-sig cold storage setup, who are you protecting from loss??? At various times I completed various questionnaires and verifications ( the same ones multiple times ), but it never led to anything. If you had $ XXXX locked in a bank account for some reason, the bank would likely be very communicative about it. Coinbase seemed like they were trying to tell me the same generic thing over and over again until I just went away. On top of that, it was never proactive. Clearly I had a half a XXXX dollar concern that I expressed multiple times, but I had to continuously bother them if I wanted to hear anything at all. Anyway, I didn't want to, but I sold XXXXBTC simply so that I could reduce my risk exposure to a company that I absolutely do not trust at all. I paid them $ XXXX in fees and because I sold, the short term capital gains tax is going to be over {$30000.00}. I'm not going to give up on sending the remaining, but once I get my BTC off of Coinbase I will never use their services again.

Product: Debt collection
Sub-issue: Didn't receive notice of right to dispute
Consumer complaint narrative:
LVNV FUNDING LLC Subject : Notice of Violation of Rights under FDCPA Dear LVNV FUNDING LLC, I am unaware of this debt. I did not have an opportunity to dispute this information.

Per my records, your agency has violated my federal rights under the Fair Debt Collection Practices Act ( FDCPA ), specifically Section 809 ( a ) ( 15 U.S.C. 1692g ( a ) ). According to the FDCPA, debt collectors are required to provide a validation notice to the consumer within five days of the initial communication regarding the collection of any debt.

If in fact you believe you gave me proper notification, then please send me the certified receipt with my name on it. Otherwise, I request that this account be immediately removed from my credit profile.

I was not aware that they have been selling this every time a loan was taken out. I have revoked their POA via the IRS. Also the 1099-C that has been shown is a valid 1099-C accepted by the IRS. So the company not complying with the directions prior would be seen as tax fraud along with this, I asked for my securities back from them and I have received nothing. Again another violation with the SEC. 
Navient is not providing correct fiduciary duties and are in dishonor. I have included the 2848 form along with a XXXX  of the 1099-C 's being accepted by the IRS. I also included the recent 1099- C. As I am the lender for the account/s and the securities would not have been made unless I had an account with them. I am in contact with the IRS and they stated I can manage the account now since POA was revoked. I have also included the arbitration paper that I will be installing in a week depending on the outcome provided by Navient. 
Also I did not give permission for them to sell my information again to XXXX and then XXXX. Again the securities that have been made off of this have not been given to me or deposited into my account. With the forensic audit I have I know they have sold my information many times. At this time Navients power of attorney is no longer.

Consumer complaint narrative: On XX/XX/XXXX, my XXXX Citi Card was declined at a restaurant. On XX/XX/XXXX, it was declined again at a movie theater. I called in on XX/XX/XXXX requesting information on why it was being declined. The first representative gave me a runaround and an ambiguous answer that I would have to wait for " further information '' either through phone, text, email, or letter. He did not specify which or the timing. The second representative hung up on me. The third one gave me the same information the first one did, transferred me to a supervisor who said the same thing, and transferred me to a manager. The manager said he could not access the account and to expect further communication. He also could specify method or timing. None of the five representatives could explain why the card was being declined nor what " additional verification '' meant. I have been unable to use this card for over 2 days now. If I'm to expect a letter, that could add two weeks which means I will lose out on two weeks to get my sign up bonus also. Citi is not providing any useful information on why my card can not be used. As far as I'm concerned, Citi is just trying to cheat me out of my money by getting me to open a card and manipulating things so I can't get the bonus or utilize the credit line.

Product: Credit reporting or other personal consumer reports
Sub-issue: Account status incorrect
Consumer complaint narrative: I obtained an account from ACIMA XXXX years ago. I got behind once I got laid off from work and then I caught it up once I went back to work and started paying on it again. I noticed that I was paying more for the items than I should so I questioned the items. I informed them of all the items I had purchased to sell inside of my store and they responded that I could not sell the merchandise until I paid them off. I informed them that I bought the merchandise from a wholesaler to sell in my boutique ; that was the purpose of purchasing the merchandise. They informed me that I could not sell the merchandise and I could return it. I informed them that I paid over what the amount of the purchase was and I refused to continue to pay on something I could not even sell. The merchandise went on to be outdated so I could not sell it so I lost out on over {$1400.00} in sales and they refused to compensate me. They informed I could send the merchandise back and I asked for my money back. They said that they could not compensate me for anything that I spent or the merchandise that wasn't sole. I filed a complaint with BBB previously and Acima agreed to label the account as paid not written off and then I checked my credit report and they stated I still owe a balance, which is far from true. They even added a new account when I only had XXXX that wasn't paid due to them owing me money. The wholesaler never informed the customers that we could not sell the merchandise we purchased. I had to stop the sale of items at my boutique due to this so I am out of {$1400.00} in sales. I sent in evidence of the paid account and the complaint previously filed and they will not correct my credit report at all. I need for Acima to reimburse me {$1400.00} I lost out. I can also send the merchandise back. They will need to pay for shipping costs, taxes, and loss of sales and inventory. They also keep sending me emails to pay tem for something I do not owe them.
